effects: Magic damage (4x, MAG) to all enemies (ignore cover and reflect)
Cure all status effects for all allies
name: Revolt

desc_short: Deal partial unmitigated damage to all enemies and cure poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralyis, confusion, disease, and stone for all allies
對全體敵人發動無視部分魔法防禦的攻擊+治療中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化狀態
적 전체에 일부 마법방어 무시 피해+아군 전체에 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 회복
Inflige des dégâts en partie fixes à tous les ennemis et soigne tous les alliés de poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie et pétrification
Fügt allen Gegnern teilweise direkten Schaden zu und heilt Gift, Blind, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein aller Verb.
Daño absoluto parcial a todos los enemigos y cura ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie a todos los aliados
